g: LobbyLand is a european lobbyist register
Data are collected from differents sources published by the european union. These data are daily updated.
Lobbyland is an independent organization whose objective is to facilitate the access of these data to citizens
Detailed statistics are available on each lobby, by country or field of activity
Whose registered office is located at
Origin of data and reusability licence
Lobbyland does not collect or use personal data from these users
lobbies from this country are present in Brussels
Public or mixed entities whose act in the public interest
Associations and networks of public regional

Informations presented on Lobbyland comes from statements made by lobbies to the European Commission. These data may be inaccurate, biased or partial. We urge you to exercise caution when reusing these data. We invite you to report any inaccurate content to the transparency register of the European Commission. These corrections will automatically be reflected on Lobbyland.

The site contains hyperlinks to third party websites. Lobbyland disclaims all liability or obligation to their offers, actions, content, products, services or any other available material. We invite you to notify us of any link on the website that would allow access to a website of third parties offering content contrary to the legislation.
Content of this site is licensed under
You may reuse the entire content of this site with the only condition to quote the source of the data

home.descr: Lobbyland is a european organization lobbyist register based on data of the transparency register published by european commission. Lobbyland illustrates and aggregates these data to facilitate its access to the citizen.

orga.varMeasured: count of involved people, lobbying costs and budget

country.varMeasured: count, costs and budget of actived european lobbys based in
country.descr: Presentation of europeans lobbys actived in Brussels based in

interet.varMeasured: count, costs and budget of european lobbys interest in
interet.descr: Presentation of europeans lobbys actived in Brussels interested in
